      • hash

        public static String hash(String toEncrypt,
                          String algorithm)
                   throws NoSuchAlgorithmException
        Generate a hash from a given string Algorithm Choices: MD2, MD5, SHA-1, SHA-224, SHA-256, SHA-384, SHA-512 It is advisable to use a SHA-2 algorithm MD2 and MD5 are long outdated SHA-1 should no longer be used, see shattered.io
        Parameters:
        toEncrypt - String to hash
        algorithm - Which hash algorithm shall be used
        Returns:
        A string which contains the hashed version of a given String
        Throws:
        NoSuchAlgorithmException - If an invalid algorithm is selected
